function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long COVID symptoms including fatigue, headaches, chest pain, and brain fog can lead to reduced functioning and quality of life.","Impact":"Reduced ability to perform daily activities and decreased quality of life for individuals with long COVID.","Mitigation":"Implementing pacing techniques and monitoring cognitive rest can help manage long COVID symptoms and improve daily functioning.","Technologies":"Health tracking apps, wearable devices, and cognitive training programs can assist in monitoring and managing long COVID symptoms.","People":"Individuals with long COVID.","Owner":"Healthcare professionals and individuals with long COVID."},{"Description":"Inability to monitor cognitive rest can lead to overexertion and symptom flare-ups for individuals with long COVID.","Impact":"Increased risk of symptom flare-ups and worsened condition for individuals with long COVID.","Mitigation":"Educating individuals about the importance of monitoring cognitive rest and providing tools for cognitive rest tracking.","Technologies":"Cognitive monitoring apps, brainwave tracking devices, and mental fatigue assessment tools.","People":"Individuals with long COVID, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, researchers, and mental health practitioners."},{"Description":"Difficulty in identifying when physical and mental exertion is beyond the individual's capacity may lead to prolonged symptoms and setbacks.","Impact":"Prolonged recovery, increased risk of symptom flare-ups, and decreased ability to manage long COVID.","Mitigation":"Implementing personalized health baselines and health tracking to monitor exertion levels and recognize patterns of symptom flare-ups.","Technologies":"Health monitoring wearables, personalized health tracking apps, and machine learning algorithms for symptom pattern recognition.","People":"Individuals with long COVID, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, researchers, and technology developers."}]}
